Job Description
At MarketDial we're building software that enables our clients to make multi-million dollar decisions. As a data scientist at MarketDial you will be working closely with our top engineers to build our analytic products and solve our client's analytical needs.

This is an exciting role where you will have a lot of opportunity to work with diverse datasets from Fortune 100 companies. You will be writing models in Python to power our products. Youll also roll up your sleeves to perform ETL in SQL and problem-solve with clients.

Skills and Qualifications
  • Excellent understanding of statistical and machine learning models (e.g., multivariate regression, classification, clustering, multidimensional scaling, trees, neural nets) including building, validating, and productionalizing models.
  • Extensive experience with Python applying some of the models above to real-world data; nice if you have utilized the R language for statistics/machine learning.
  • Extensive experience using database query languages like SQL.
  • Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI, D3.js , Highcharts).
  • Experience with GitHub for collaboration and version control.
  • Great communication and client management skills.
  • Data-oriented personality.
  • Ability to own a problem and seek innovative solutions without heavy oversight or guidance.
